pages.text: 86|1|Savgand ʙa osmon va savgand ʙa sitorai saʙgard
86|2|Va ci medoni, ki sitorai saʙgard cist
86|3|[Hamon] Sitorai furuzon ast
86|4|Hec kas nest magar on ki ʙar u nigahʙone [az faristagon gumosta suda] ast
86|5|Inson ʙojad ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarida sudaast
86|6|Az jak oʙi cahanda ofarida sudaast
86|7|Ki az mijoni [ustuxoni] pust [-i mard] va sina [-i zan] ʙerun meojad
86|8|Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙar ʙozgardondani u [pas az marg] tavonost
86|9|Ruze, ki rozho oskor gardad
86|10|[Dar on ruz] Inson hec tavonu jovare nadorad
86|11|Savgand ʙa osmoni purʙoron
86|12|Va savgand ʙa zamini pursikof [ki gijohon az on sar ʙarmeovarand]
86|13|Be gumon, in Qur'on suxani cudokunandai haq az ʙotil ast
86|14|Va [suxani] hazlu ʙehuda nest
86|15|Onon [kofiron] pajvasta hila va najrang mekunand
86|16|Va man [niz] hila [va tadʙir] mekunam
86|17|Pas, kofironro muhlat deh, [va] andake rahojason kun [to ƣarqi gunoh ʙosand]
87|1|Nomi Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙaatro ʙa poki jod kun
87|2|[Hamon] ki [insonro] ofarid va hamohang va mutaodil soxt
87|3|Va [hamon] kase, ki andozagiri kard va [ʙa soistagi ofarid] va sipas hidojat namud
87|4|Va [on] kase, ki carogohro [ʙaroi taƣzijai condoron] rujonid
87|5|Sipas onro xusku sijoh gardonid
87|6|Mo ʙa zudi [Qur'onro] ʙar tu mexonem; pas, tu hargiz [onro] faromus naxohi kard
87|7|Magar on ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad; hamono U oskoru nihonro medonad
87|8|Va ʙaroi tu osontarin [roh]-ro faroham megardonem
87|9|Pas, agar pandi mufid ʙosad, [mardumro ʙo ojoti Qur'on] pand deh
87|10|Ba zudi, kase, ki [az Alloh taolo] metarsad, pand mepazirad
87|11|Va ʙadʙaxttarin [-i mardum] az on duri meguzinad
87|12|[Hamon] Kase, ki dar otasi ʙuzurg [-i cahannam] darxohad omad
87|13|Va dar on [otas] na memirad va na zinda memonad
87|14|Jaqinan, kase, ki xudro [az kufru gunoh] pok kunad, rastagor xohad sud
87|15|Va [niz kase, ki] nomi Parvardigorasro jod kunad va namoz ʙiguzorad
